youwereslain.title: You Were Slain Config
youwereslain.text.group.tooltip: All config options related to text
youwereslain.deathmessage.tooltip: The replacement for the "You Died!" text
youwereslain.deathreason.tooltip: Display the reason for the player's death
youwereslain.score.tooltip: Display the player's score upon death
youwereslain.buttons.group.tooltip: All config options related to buttons
youwereslain.button.title: Show Title Screen Button
youwereslain.coord.group.tooltip: All config options related to coordinates
youwereslain.showcoords.tooltip: Show your death coordinates on the death screen
youwereslain.chatcoords.tooltip: Send a chat message containing your death coordinates that only you can see
youwereslain.gradient.group.tooltip: All config options related to the death gradient
youwereslain.gradient.tooltip: If enabled, the two options below will be used for the death gradient colors instead of the default colors
youwereslain.respawn.group.tooltip: All config options related to respawning
youwereslain.respawndelay.tooltip: Should there be any respawn delay?
youwereslain.timer.tooltip: Show the time you have left until you respawn on the death screen
youwereslain.delay.tooltip: The delay(in seconds) until you respawn after death
youwereslain.respawnmessage.tooltip: The message telling you how long you have until you respawn
youwereslain.respawnmessage.tooltip.time: Use "<time>" for the seconds left until you respawn
youwereslain.delayoverride.tooltip: Enable the ability to hold shift on the death screen to activate an emergency respawn button
youwereslain.emergencyrespawn.tooltip: Text that alerts the user they are about to activate the emergency respawn button
youwereslain.emergencyrespawn.tooltip.ti: Use "<time>" for the seconds left until the emergency respawn button appears
youwereslain.hud.tooltip: If the HUD isn't hidden upon death, this option will hide it until respawning
youwereslain.enabled.tooltip: If enabled, the death screen will use options from the "Death Screen" category. If disabled, the death screen will look like vanilla Minecraft's death screen.
youwereslain.nosoftlock.showmessage.tool: If respawn delay, show respawn button, and show title screen button config options are disabled, it is possible to get softlocked(unable to respawn). However, this mod attempt to prevent that from happening. If a softlock was prevented, a message at the bottom of the death screen will appear. Disabling this config option disables that text.
youwereslain.fadeinworkaround.tooltip: In very specific multiplayer environments, fading in text will sometimes flicker. If this option is enabled, it attempts to workaround the flickering by adding extra time to the delay before the fade in. It is recommended to disable this option unless you notice the fading in text flickering in multiplayer.
youwereslain.hidehudworkaround.tooltip: In very specific multiplayer environments, the Hide HUD Upon Death option bugs out. It almost never unhides the HUD when it should. If this option is enabled, it attempts to workaround the hidden HUD bug by always unhiding it, even if the HUD was hidden before death. It is recommended to disable this option unless you notice the Hide HUD option isn't working as intended in multiplayer.
youwereslain.workarounds.note: ยง7I was only able to reproduce this bug using a specific server software on a specific Minecraft version. On other software, it seemingly never happened. Using the same software on newer Minecraft versions also seemed to fix the issue. However, if it was on a slightly older version of Minecraft, it bugged out.
youwereslain.pack.group.tooltip: Options related to resource packs and You Were Slain. Please refer to the wiki for more information.
youwereslain.sound.tooltip: Should there be a resource pack-editable sound that plays upon death? If no resource pack edits this sound, nothing will be heard, as the default sound is silent.
youwereslain.sound.volume.tooltip: Controls the volume of the death sound. Also note that the master volume slider affects the volume.
youwereslain.sound.loop.tooltip: Loop the death sound effect until respawn
youwereslain.nosoftlock.prevented: A possible softlock has been prevented
youwereslain.nosoftlock.help: Please check your config and enable respawn delay or any button
